pr_title: [BEAM-11331] Change region flag to awsRegion in io.aws2

timeline.message: [BEAM-11331] Change region flag to awsRegion in io.aws2
[BEAM-11331] Change region flag to awsRegion in io.aws2

timeline.bodyText: @iemejia Don't you remember why it was named differently? There is also getEndpoint()/setEndpoint() that were getAwsServiceEndpoint()/setAwsServiceEndpoint() before?
timeline.author: aromanenko-dev

replies.bodyText: I think it was to be aligned with the AWSv2 naming convention.
replies.author: iemejia

replies.bodyText: Yes, makes sense. But don't you think we have to change it to avoid naming conflicts? Also, looking into the code, I don't see if these options have been even used before for AWS v2.
replies.author: aromanenko-dev
